CatDescriptText: Cutline of article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 18, 1960, pg. A11 reads: "The Courier-WAMO Home-A-Rama Home and Food Show which concluded a successful three-day presentation of food demonstrations, star-spangled entertainment, fashion show and beautiful displays and exhibits at the Syria Mosque last week..."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of man, and four women, including Daisy Lampkin and Jessie Vann, posed in front of WAMO Broadcast Booth at 1960 Courier WAMO Home-A-Rama, Syria Mosque
CatSubject_tab: WAMO (Pittsburgh, Pa).Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Vann, Jessie, 1889-1967.Lampkin, Daisy E. (Daisy Elizabeth), 1882-1965.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
